thread.section_title: Play-Asia.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Play-Asia.com | www.play-asia.com | 3 of 333
thread.title: Sudarshan Kondgekar

author: Sudarshan Kondgekar
title: Sudarshan Kondgekar
text:
I had purchased windows 10 professional product key at extreamly reasonable rate that is 9.99$.
Initially thought it as fake. I went through play asia website and it looked like professional website.
I had purchased 1 OEM key which I tried and it worked. Thats great.
Nobody else can provide genuine microsoft windows 10 professional at this rate. I recommend go for this website.
Entire process of purchase, payment and receipt of code works seamlessly. I paid using paypal. And immediately received product key at my email.
Its also important to mention that I had purchased 3 product keys out of which first when I purchased didn't worked. Throwing an error that "This key is already used" I had sent an email about the issue. Customer support had handled it professionally and understood the issue. They issued a new key immediately next day. And that key worked. Thereafter I had purchased 2 more keys which worked perfectly without any issue. I really recommend this as a genuine website to buy digital content.
Keep it up
